Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing to inform you about a refund issue with my recent order placed
on the PharmEasy app.

I had ordered *3 items* in this order. However, *one item (Prolox F)* was
delivered incorrectly. I returned the incorrect item as per the return
process.

On *13th December*, I received a message confirming that the returned item
had *reached back to the store*. The *refund amount of ₹689* is expected
for this returned item.

However, till now, I am *unable to see any refund initiated* in the app. I
also tried contacting support through the EasyBot chatbot, but it shows
that there is *no refund associated with my last order*, which is incorrect.

I am currently unable to call customer care due to network/recharge
constraints, hence I am requesting support via email.

*Request:*
Kindly check this issue on priority and initiate the refund of *₹689* at
the earliest.

*Order details:*

   -

   Registered mobile number: *8209952754*
   -

   Order ID: 653408438650232832
   -

   Returned item: *Prolox F*
   -

   Refund amount: *₹689*

I request you to please update me regarding the refund status at the
earliest.
[image: photo_2025-12-15 13.32.38.jpeg][image: photo_2025-12-15
13.32.44.jpeg][image: photo_2025-12-15 13.32.42.jpeg]
There are some screenshots i have attached


Thank you for your support.

Regards,
*Manjeet Singh *

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,
I am writing to inform you about a refund issue with my recent order placed on the PharmEasy app.
I had ordered 3 items in this order. However, one item (Prolox F) was delivered incorrectly. I returned the incorrect item as per the return process.
On 13th December, I received a message confirming that the returned item had reached back to the store. The refund amount of ₹689 is expected for this returned item.
However, till now, I am unable to see any refund initiated in the app. I also tried contacting support through the EasyBot chatbot, but it shows that there is no refund associated with my last order, which is incorrect.
I am currently unable to call customer care due to network/recharge constraints, hence I am requesting support via email.
Request:
Kindly check this issue on priority and initiate the refund of ₹689 at the earliest.
Order details:
  • Registered mobile number: 8209952754
  • Order ID: 653408438650232832
  • Returned item: Prolox F
  • Refund amount: ₹689
I request you to please update me regarding the refund status at the earliest.
There are some screenshots i have attached

Thank you for your support.
Regards,
Manjeet Singh

notes.body: Hello Manjeet,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      Thank you for your time on the call. Pursuant to our conversation, I hope to have addressed your concerns.     As a token of apology, we have credited Rs. 50 to your PharmEasy wallet.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Manjeet,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Manisha

notes.body: Hello Adarsh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657655548313108480-50193, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML  on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account wthin 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Adarsh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657655548313108480-50193, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML  on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account wthin 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Jatin,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656584963386540032-96410, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine TOCOFIL MAX STRIP OF 15 SOFTGEL CAPSULES 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.     Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Jatin,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656584963386540032-96410, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine TOCOFIL MAX STRIP OF 15 SOFTGEL CAPSULES 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

I have highlighted the issue to the Escalations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.

The issue is being investigated, this will take 24-48 hours from the time of reporting the issue. Once the issue is verified, we will initiate a refund against the missing medicines. We will inform you of the status once we receive an update from our Partner Retailer.

Please confirm whether the parcel was intact or if any damage was there from the outside at the time of delivery.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Manisha

Hello Jatin,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

A refund of Rs. 350.40 is initiated to your account. Post initiation, the refund will be credited to your source account within 3-5 business days. Please note that Saturday, Sunday, and bank holidays are not included in this. 
 
A Promotional discount of Rs. 70.08 is credited to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. This amount will expire on 14.06.2026 at 11:59 PM. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I am writing to formally register a complaint regarding the non-delivery of
my medicine order.

Tracking ID: BSRC5227848395
Expected Delivery Date: 12th-14th December.

This order was scheduled to be delivered on the 14th December, but I have
yet to receive any update even after the delay, and there has been no
recent status update on the tracking page Still showing “In Transit” / No
update since the last few days  from 10th December .

I have repeatedly tried to reach your customer support team through the
helpline  app chat, but every time I am connected only to a chatbot that
provides generic responses and is unable to resolve the issue or connect me
to a human agent. No satisfactory resolution or realistic update has been
provided so far.

Since some of these are essential medicines, this delay is causing
significant risks. I cannot afford to wait indefinitely without information.

Please treat this with high urgency and  expedite the logistics and ensure
the package is delivered to me ASAP (preferably within the next 12-24
hours).

Regards

Sourabh Sharma

--

With regards to your order #657988586437652480-71157, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Kevin Sejpal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #657988586437652480-71157, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 16th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Dilip,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657692470586183680-90319, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the PHOTOBAN 50 AQUAGEL SPF 50 PA+++ SUNSCREEN 60 GM on 17th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Dilip,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657692470586183680-90319, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the PHOTOBAN 50 AQUAGEL SPF 50 PA+++ SUNSCREEN 60 GM on 17th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear sir
Whenever  I order for medicine the name of Dr  appears  different as it
suits  to the company and  or  what is  generated
 in your system   though I have nither given the name of such Dr whom I
have never refered or
 known.
 Even when the prescription is uploaded on whatapp  and given clear
instruction  to mention name of patient  and Name of Dr but the same is not
complied and invoice is generated with the name of petient  and Dr as per
previous order  Once I received the invoice I have to contact customer care
for making required correction and get duly corrected invoice on mail after
few days. This is clear  wastage of time of your executive as well
inconvenience  to the customer.
Further technically also as per my knowledge if  by consuming medicine
ordered if it effects adversely  in that case the Dr whose name appear may
be held responsible.
However it is technical issue which your company has to decide.

You are aware that under medical claim the name of petient  should be as
per prescription  and Dr  name  should be whose prescription  is attached.
 This short of  difficulties I have experienced many times last year  also
and suggestion was made but no attention given to find out the solution .
My suggestion is when the customer place order he should along with detail
of medicine spell out the name of petient as well name of Dr to be
mentioned on invoice  even if it is reapeat order.
As per your system all communication is recorded.  If order is placed on
whatsapp along with prescription in that case though it may be repeat order
the name of petient  and Dr should be as stated in prescription .
Hope you will find out suitable solution to resolve above difficulties
experienced  by me . I do not know whether any other customers  face such
difficulties .
Thanking  you
Yours   Sincerely
Vinod Maniar

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Complaintbin preparing invoice
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear sir
Whenever  I order for medicine the name of Dr  appears  different as it suits  to the company and  or  what is  generated
 in your system   though I have nither given the name of such Dr whom I have never refered or 
 known.
 Even when the prescription is uploaded on whatapp  and given clear instruction  to mention name of patient  and Name of Dr but the same is not complied and invoice is generated with the name of petient  and Dr as per previous order  Once I received the invoice I have to contact customer care for making required correction and get duly corrected invoice on mail after few days. This is clear  wastage of time of your executive as well inconvenience  to the customer.
Further technically also as per my knowledge if  by consuming medicine ordered if it effects adversely  in that case the Dr whose name appear may be held responsible.
However it is technical issue which your company has to decide.

You are aware that under medical claim the name of petient  should be as per prescription  and Dr  name  should be whose prescription  is attached.
 This short of  difficulties I have experienced many times last year  also and suggestion was made but no attention given to find out the solution .
My suggestion is when the customer place order he should along with detail of medicine spell out the name of petient as well name of Dr to be mentioned on invoice  even if it is reapeat order. 
As per your system all communication is recorded.  If order is placed on whatsapp along with prescription in that case though it may be repeat order the name of petient  and Dr should be as stated in prescription .
Hope you will find out suitable solution to resolve above difficulties experienced  by me . I do not know whether any other customers  face such difficulties .
Thanking  you
Yours   Sincerely 
Vinod Maniar

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Grievance Officer / Customer Care Team,

I am writing to formally escalate the issue regarding my order *#22011585*
for *Morff 5%*, which I received twice with tampered seals. Despite
multiple calls to customer care and repeated assurances, *no resolution has
been provided*.

*Timeline of Events:*

   -

   *First delivery:* Seal broken; initially ignored.
   -

   *Second delivery (Oct 1, 2025):* Seal again tampered.
   -

   *Returned product:* Oct 2, 2025.
   -

   *Customer care calls:* 5–6 times; promised resolution each time, but no
   refund or replacement has been provided.

It is now *15 December 2025*, and my order has still not been resolved.

I request *immediate action*. I expect either:

   1.

   A full *refund* for order #22011585, *or*
   2.

   A *replacement of the same product* delivered in proper, sealed
   condition.

Please confirm the action within *7 business days*. If no resolution is
provided, I will escalate this matter to *consumer forums and my bank for
dispute/chargeback*.

This issue has caused *significant inconvenience*, and I expect prompt
action.

Thanks
Arun Chib
+91-9620199028

--

notes.body_html:
Hello Arun,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

An investigation was conducted and found that a fresh item MORR F 5% SOLUTION 60ML was properly packed and dispatched to you intact. Under the return request, we received the item in used condition, filled with water. Hence, the return request is rejected.

As a one-time exception, we can credit Rs. 581.50 to your PharmEasy wallet refund cash section. This amount will not expire, and you can use it for your next order. Please confirm to proceed. 
 
Awaiting your reply. 

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body:
Hi,

Thank you for processing the refund. However, placing blame does not
resolve the issue. Upon inspection, I observed that the *solution appeared
to be tampered with*, and *a portion of the total quantity was missing* at
the time of receipt.
The claim that the product was used or filled with water is factually
incorrect. I request you to re-verify your internal return inspection
process, as there appears to be an error or misreporting. The total
quantity is 60 ml; even if 5 ml were allegedly missing, a new bottle could
easily be prepared by taking 5 ml from 12 other bottles, allowing the
seller to profit - calling into question the validity of the allegation.

I would also like to highlight that *this is the second time this issue has
occurred*, which is concerning. I request that this matter be reviewed
seriously to prevent recurrence in the future.
Thanks
Arun
---------- Forwarded message ---------
notes.body_html:
Hi,
Thank you for processing the refund. However, placing blame does not resolve the issue. Upon inspection, I observed that the solution appeared to be tampered with, and a portion of the total quantity was missing at the time of receipt.
The claim that the product was used or filled with water is factually incorrect. I request you to re-verify your internal return inspection process, as there appears to be an error or misreporting. The total quantity is 60 ml; even if 5 ml were allegedly missing, a new bottle could easily be prepared by taking 5 ml from 12 other bottles, allowing the seller to profit - calling into question the validity of the allegation.
I would also like to highlight that this is the second time this issue has occurred, which is concerning. I request that this matter be reviewed seriously to prevent recurrence in the future.
Thanks
Arun

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22265052  
      Subject: Complaint about worst customer service  
      Description:  
 
 
 Dear PharmEasy Customer Support, 
   
 I am writing to express my extreme frustration regarding an unfulfilled order placed on November 26th that has not yet been delivered. This order contains critical, time-sensitive heart medication that is unavailable in local stores. 
   
 I have repeatedly contacted your customer service executives, but each time I am simply told to wait, which is unacceptable. I have been completely out of this critical medication for the last five days, and no solution or support has been provided by your team. I must ask who will take responsibility should a serious health issue arise due to this delay. 
   
 I urgently require an immediate resolution to this issue. Please find the order details below. 
   
 Please be aware that if a satisfactory resolution is not provided immediately, I intend to share this entire service incident on LinkedIn to inform other potential customers. 
   
   
 Order Details: 652716563622387712 Contact Number: 9780624350  
 
 
  
   Regards  Ridham Goyal   
 
 

 
 Disclaimer:

Dear PharmEasy Customer Support,

I am writing to express my extreme frustration regarding an unfulfilled order placed on November 26th that has not yet been delivered. This order contains critical, time-sensitive heart medication that is unavailable in local stores.

I have repeatedly contacted your customer service executives, but each time I am simply told to wait, which is unacceptable. I have been completely out of this critical medication for the last five days, and no solution or support has been provided by your team. I must ask who will take responsibility should a serious health issue arise due to this delay.

I urgently require an immediate resolution to this issue. Please find the order details below.

Please be aware that if a satisfactory resolution is not provided immediately, I intend to share this entire service incident on LinkedIn to inform other potential customers.

Contact Number: 9780624350


Regards

We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. We can see that your order was canceled on 10 December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances and operational isuues at ;ogistc end, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

notes.body: Hello Sanjay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  We refer to your below mail & Order id -6233114  For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:  Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.  Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.  A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.  Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.  Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.  Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.  For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Suraj Gupta PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sanjay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We refer to your below mail & Order id -6233114

For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:

Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.

Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.

A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.

Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.

Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment.

Please note: This option will only be visible for orders where the Free Doctor Consultation offer was available at the time of placing the order.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Suraj Gupta
PharmEasy
